title: Blood Bond (Dirty Blood series Book 3)
features: If I had to choose one word to sum up all of my problems, this would be it. Without hybrids, I wouldn’t have to watch my best friend slowly becoming a monster. Without hybrids, I could let go of the mentality “hunt or be hunted.” CHAS wouldn’t be scouring the Earth, intent on slaughtering and using Alex to do it. Without hybrids, I wouldn’t have to be on guard that losing my temper meant losing my shape. There would be no monster inside me, struggling to get out. Then again, without hybrids, I wouldn’t have Wesley St. John.Blood Bond is book 3 in the bestselling Dirty Blood series.
description: Q What makes the Dirty Blood series special?

A It's a couple of things. First, I wanted to explore a worldwhere the line between good guys and bad guys became blurred. Werewolves areone of my favorite paranormal creatures--animal instincts make for killeraction! And the love story is not what you'd expect. A racial divide combinedwith all the hormones and feelings of a teenaged girl with a stubborn streakand a mysterious guy who has experienced more loss than most people can handle.The whole series is designed to make you fall in love--with thecharacters and the story. You'll definitely want to turn the page to find out whathappens next and whether they'll kiss or kill!
Q Why should readers give this series a try?

A The Dirty Blood series is fun, fast-paced, and the perfectrisk--considering book one is currently free! And once you get to the end ofbook one, I'm willing to bet you'll be hooked.The series if the perfect blend for lovers of paranormalromance and action/adventure. There's really something in here for everyone.
Q Will there be any more books in the series?

A BROKEN BLOOD is the last book in the story of Tara and Wes.There will be a spinoff series coming in 2016 that will chronicle Sam's journey(Tara's human best friend) and some of the existing characters will follow. Youcan stay updated on info about that by signing up for my mailing list at heatherhildenbrand.com.And thanks for reading!

was born and raised in a small town in northern Virginia where she was homeschooled through high school. (She's only slightly socially awkward as a result.) Since 2011, she's published more than fifteen YA & NA novels including the bestselling Dirty Blood series. She splits her time between coastal Virginia and the island of Guam and loves having a mobile career and outrageous lifestyle of living in two places. Her most frequent hobbies are riding motorcycles and avoiding killer slugs. Heather is also a publishing and success coach bent on equipping and educating artists who call themselves authors.
